description: This file defines the IUserSettings interface within the WPEFramework, including nested notification interface and various properties and methods for user setting configurations like audio description, preferred languages, captions, closed caption service, and privacy mode. It also includes callback mechanisms for settings changes.

classes.name: IUserSettings
classes.description: Interface for user settings management, including registration of notifications, setting and getting various user preferences, and handling notifications for setting changes.

classes.name: IUserSettings::INotification
classes.description: Callback interface for notifications when user settings change, such as audio description, languages, captions, caption services, and privacy mode.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback object which will be notified of user setting changes.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification callback object.

methods.name: GetAudioDescription
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the audio description setting.

methods.name: SetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Sets the list of preferred audio languages in ISO 639-2/B codes.

methods.name: GetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Gets the list of preferred audio languages.

methods.name: SetPresentationLanguage
methods.description: Sets the presentation language specified in full BCP 47 format.

methods.name: GetPresentationLanguage
methods.description: Gets the current presentation language setting.

methods.name: SetPreferredCaptionsLanguages
methods.description: Sets the list of preferred caption languages.

methods.name: GetPreferredCaptionsLanguages
methods.description: Gets the preferred captions languages list.

methods.name: SetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Sets the preferred closed caption service.

methods.name: GetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Retrieves the preferred closed caption service.

methods.name: SetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Sets the privacy mode, such as sharing or not sharing data.

methods.name: GetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Gets the current privacy mode setting.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
